attributes.action: Impeach the prime minister if he ignores a new no-deal Brexit law.
attributes.additional_details: The prime minister is not going to ask EU to extend the Brexit date and that is unlawful action.
attributes.background: I do believe that the prime minister must obey the law and ask for additional extension for the Brexit process.

rejection.details: It would be a matter for the courts to decide if the law had been broken.
